author: siladu
content:
This is to support the nonce mismatch test in EEST v1.3.1
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/1158

Question: without this exception mapping in place, should we expect the hive version (`consume-engine`) of this test to fail as well, or is it only checked when running `uv fill ...`?

author: marioevz
content: It's only checked with fill, we need to update consume engine but this PR looks good to me üëç

content:
